languages.text: "Владайм Токара — очень занятный юноша. Общение с ним может стать для вас хорошим боевым крещением в политических играх Футфола. Об этом не принято говорить вслух, но Наместник Владайм — ставленник {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллики{/g}, крупнейшего синдиката преступных баронов сектора Каликсис. Их специализация — {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладный торг{/g}, то есть торговля всякой {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносской{/g} дрянью".

traits.locale_text: "Владайм Токара — очень занятный юноша. Общение с ним может стать для вас хорошим боевым крещением в политических играх Футфола. Об этом не принято говорить вслух, но Наместник Владайм — ставленник Миссии Касбаллики, крупнейшего синдиката преступных баронов сектора Каликсис. Их специализация — Хладный торг, то есть торговля всякой ксеносской дрянью".

languages.text: "Vladaym Tocara is a very peculiar young man. Consider your upcoming conversation a baptism of fire in Footfall's political arena. Such things are not spoken out loud, but Liege Tocara is the appointee of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, the largest robber baron crime syndicate in the Calixis Sector. They specialise in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} — the buying and selling of all kinds of {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} rubbish."
languages.original_text: "Владайм Токара — очень занятный юноша. Общение с ним может стать для вас хорошим боевым крещением в политических играх Футфола. Об этом не принято говорить вслух, но Наместник Владайм — ставленник {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Миссии Касбаллики{/g}, крупнейшего синдиката преступных баронов сектора Каликсис. Их специализация — {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладный торг{/g}, то есть торговля всякой {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}ксеносской{/g} дрянью".

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara is a very peculiar young man. Consider your upcoming conversation a baptism under fire of sorts, a prelude to the local political struggle. Such things are not spoken out loud, but Governor Vladaym is the appointee of the Kasballica Mission, the largest robber baron crime syndicate in the Kalixis sector. They specialize in cold trade, buying and selling all kinds of xeno rubbish."

They specialize in cold trade, buying and selling all kinds of xeno rubbish."

languages.text: «Vladaym Tocara es un joven muy peculiar. Podría considerar su inminente conversación con él una suerte de bautismo de fuego en la arena política de Paso. Hay cosas que no se dicen abiertamente, pero el Señor Tocara ha sido nombrado por la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Misión Kasballica{/g}, el sindicato criminal de magnates ladrones más grande del sector Calixis. Se especializan en el {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comercio Frío{/g}: la compraventa de toda clase de chatarra {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}».
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara is a very peculiar young man. Consider your upcoming conversation a baptism of fire in Footfall's political arena. Such things are not spoken out loud, but Liege Tocara is the appointee of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, the largest robber baron crime syndicate in the Calixis Sector. They specialise in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} — the buying and selling of all kinds of {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} rubbish."

traits.locale_text: «Vladaym Tocara es un joven muy peculiar. Podría considerar su inminente conversación con él una suerte de bautismo de fuego en la arena política de Paso. Hay cosas que no se dicen abiertamente, pero el Señor Tocara ha sido nombrado por la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Misión Kasballica{/g}, el sindicato criminal de magnates ladrones más grande del sector Calixis. Se especializan en el {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comercio Frío{/g}: la compraventa de toda clase de chatarra {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g}».

languages.text: “弗拉迪姆·托卡拉是位与众不同的年轻人，您可以将这场会面看做是落脚港政治生涯的首次洗礼。接下来的话，恐怕就不能摆在明面上说了。托卡拉总督是{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}派来的人。他们是卡利西斯星区规模最大的犯罪集团，专门从事{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市贸易{/g}，也就是买卖各种{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}垃圾。”
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara is a very peculiar young man. Consider your upcoming conversation a baptism of fire in Footfall's political arena. Such things are not spoken out loud, but Liege Tocara is the appointee of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, the largest robber baron crime syndicate in the Calixis Sector. They specialise in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} — the buying and selling of all kinds of {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} rubbish."

traits.locale_text: “弗拉迪姆·托卡拉是位与众不同的年轻人，您可以将这场会面看做是落脚港政治生涯的首次洗礼。接下来的话，恐怕就不能摆在明面上说了。托卡拉总督是{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团{/g}派来的人。他们是卡利西斯星区规模最大的犯罪团伙，专门从事{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市贸易{/g}，也就是买卖各种{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}异形{/g}垃圾。”

languages.text: 「ヴラダイム・トカラは非常に変わった男です。これからする話は、フットフォールの政治界における厳しい試練と捉えてください。大きな声では言えませんが、領主・トカラはキャリクシス星域最大の大窃盗犯罪組織{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}を任命した男です。聖務団は{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}闇取引{/g}、つまりありとあらゆる{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}のゴミの売買を専門としています」
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara is a very peculiar young man. Consider your upcoming conversation a baptism of fire in Footfall's political arena. Such things are not spoken out loud, but Liege Tocara is the appointee of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, the largest robber baron crime syndicate in the Calixis Sector. They specialise in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} — the buying and selling of all kinds of {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} rubbish."

traits.locale_text: 「ヴラダイム・トカラは非常に変わった男です。これからする話は、フットフォールの政治界における厳しい試練と捉えてください。大きな声では言えませんが、領主・トカラはキャリクシス星域最大の大窃盗犯罪組織{g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}カスバリカ聖務団{/g}を任命した男です。聖務団は{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}闇取引{/g}、つまりありとあらゆる{g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}異種族{/g}のゴミの売買を専門としています」

languages.text: "Vladaym Tocara ist ein sehr besonderer junger Mann. Betrachtet Euer bevorstehendes Gespräch als Feuertaufe in der politischen Arena von Footfall. Man spricht nicht offen darüber, aber Lehnsherr Tocara ist der ernannte Vertreter der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica-Mission{/g}, des größten Räuberbaron-Verbrechersyndikats im Calixis-Sektor. Dessen Spezialgebiet ist der {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthandel{/g} – der Kauf und Verkauf aller Arten von {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Müll."
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara is a very peculiar young man. Consider your upcoming conversation a baptism of fire in Footfall's political arena. Such things are not spoken out loud, but Liege Tocara is the appointee of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, the largest robber baron crime syndicate in the Calixis Sector. They specialise in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} — the buying and selling of all kinds of {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} rubbish."

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara ist ein sehr besonderer junger Mann. Betrachtet Euer bevorstehendes Gespräch als Feuertaufe in der politischen Arena von Footfall. Man spricht nicht offen darüber, aber Lehnsherr Tocara ist der ernannte Vertreter der {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica-Mission{/g}, des größten Räuberbaron-Verbrechersyndikats im Calixis-Sektor. Dessen Spezialgebiet ist der {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthandel{/g} – der Kauf und Verkauf aller Arten von {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}Xenos{/g}-Müll."

languages.text: « Vladaym Tocara est un jeune homme des plus singuliers. Considérez votre entrevue à venir comme un baptême du feu dans l'arène politique de Castel. On ne dit pas ce genre de choses à voix haute, mais Tocara a été désigné par la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g}, le plus grand syndicat criminel du secteur Calixis. Ils se spécialisent dans le {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g} : l'achat et la vente de toutes sortes de babioles {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. »
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara is a very peculiar young man. Consider your upcoming conversation a baptism of fire in Footfall's political arena. Such things are not spoken out loud, but Liege Tocara is the appointee of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, the largest robber baron crime syndicate in the Calixis Sector. They specialise in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} — the buying and selling of all kinds of {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} rubbish."

traits.locale_text: « Vladaym Tocara est un jeune homme des plus singuliers. Considérez votre entrevue à venir comme un baptême du feu dans l'arène politique de Castel. On ne dit pas ce genre de choses à voix haute, mais Tocara a été désigné par la {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Mission de la Kasballica{/g}, le plus grand syndicat criminel du secteur Calixis. Ils se spécialisent dans le {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g} : l'achat et la vente de toutes sortes de babioles {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xénos{/g}. »

languages.text: "Vladaym Tocara, kelimenin tam anlamıyla kendine has bir gençtir. Aranızda geçecek konuşmayı, Binliman'ın siyasal arenasına kabul sınavınız olarak görebilirsiniz. Böyle şeyler yüksek sesle dillendirilmez ama Emîr Tocara, Calixis Sektörü'nün en büyük soyguncu baron suç örgütü olan {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu'nca{/g} o makama tayin edilmiştir. Bu örgüt, {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Soğuk Ticaret'te{/g}, yani her türden {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} döküntüsü alım satımında ihtisaslaşmıştır."
languages.original_text: "Vladaym Tocara is a very peculiar young man. Consider your upcoming conversation a baptism of fire in Footfall's political arena. Such things are not spoken out loud, but Liege Tocara is the appointee of the {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Mission{/g}, the largest robber baron crime syndicate in the Calixis Sector. They specialise in the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trade{/g} — the buying and selling of all kinds of {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}xenos{/g} rubbish."

traits.locale_text: "Vladaym Tocara son derece kendine has bir gençtir. Aranızda geçecek konuşmayı, Binliman'ın siyasal arenasına kabul sınavınız olarak değerlendirebilirsiniz. Bu tip şeyler yüksek sesle dile getirilmez belki ama Emîr Tocara, Calixis Sektörü'ndeki en büyük soyguncu baron suç örgütü {g|Encyclopedia:KasballicaMission}Kasballica Misyonu{/g} tarafından atanmıştır. {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Soğuk Ticaret{/g}'te, yani her türden {g|Encyclopedia:Xenos}zeno{/g} döküntüsü alım satımında uzmanlaşmışlardır."
